hero.title: Software Engineer
hero.description: Software Engineer with advanced training in Cybersecurity and experience in Data Science. Currently working at GAINKODE developing mobile and web applications. Previous experience at Andorra Telecom as a Data Scientist and knowledge in cryptography. Specialized in web development, data analysis, and computer security.

projects.title: My Projects
projects.subtitle: Some of my recent work
projects.description: A selection of projects that demonstrate my experience in software development, from full-stack applications, mobile apps, to backend and frontend solutions.
projects.comingSoon: This is my first public project. I'm currently working on new developments that I'll be adding to this section soon. My focus is on creating high-quality projects that demonstrate my technical skills and creativity.

portfoliowebsite.title: Personal Portfolio
portfoliowebsite.description: Personal website developed with React, TypeScript, and Next.js. Includes advanced animations, particle effects, custom cursor, and responsive design.
portfoliowebsite.longDescription: Personal website developed with React, TypeScript, and Next.js. Includes advanced animations, particle effects, custom cursor, and responsive design. Demonstrates my skills in modern frontend development with a fluid and interactive user experience. Implements WebGL for visual effects, animations with Framer Motion, and a fully responsive design.

experience.readyDescription: With my experience in full-stack development and my passion for creating innovative solutions, I'm ready to take your project to the next level.

description: Web application development using modern technologies
Implementation of frontend solutions with AngularJS
On-site work in full-time development team
Application of software development best practices
Analysis and processing of large volumes of data
Development of data models and predictive analysis
Work with monitoring and log analysis tools
Application development with focus on security and cryptography
